author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Over the past few days you may have heard of this thing called Wplace.live well the service that was powering was a free instance of OpenFreeMap and obviously that wasn't going to last that long and the author didn't even realize what was happening

title: How WPlace Almost Crushed OpenFreeMap
